# cockroach-extra Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform

  required_providers {
    cockroach-extra = {
      source = "registry.terraform.io/nrfcloud/cockroach-extra"
    }
  }
}

provider "cockroach-extra" {
  #  api_key = "<YOU API KEY>"
}
```
